extendedInfo.description: Formerly known as Find A Starbucks, relaunched with a new name and logo after receiving a Cease and Desist from Starbucks.Update:Support has been added for Dunkin' Donuts, Peets Coffee, Tim Hortons, Caribou Coffee, Seattle's Best, Coffee Bean and Au Bon Pain. Nutritional Information is now also available from the menu.If you love Starbucks coffee then this is the Starbucks finder app for you. Itâs real easy to use and will help you find a Starbucks store that is close to your current location.Usage:On start the application tries to determine your current location using either gps or network (wifi + 3g). Once your location is determined a default search will be performed which will return the 10 closest Starbucks stores to your location. Using the phone menu button you can bring up the menu options to search, move the map to your location, clear the results, etc. Using this search option or the search button brings up the search dialog. On this dialog you can filter your search based on stores with certain features such as drive-through or open 24 hours.Features:    * Search by:          o using your current location either gps or network          o search by address you enter    * When searching you can specify          o Stores open 24 hours          o Stores with drive-throughs          o Stores that accept mobile pay    * Contains Map and List views          o The map view shows your current location and the location of the Starbucks stores. Tapping on a location shows a popup with more information.          o The list view shows information about each Starbucks store.          o Information shown includes                + address                + phone number                + hours if available and also whether the store is currently open.                + features such as mobile pay, drive-through, wifi, etc          o Clicking on either a map popup or a store in the List will direct you to Google Maps with turn by turn navigation to the store          o Long clicking on a store in the List will call the store (maybe if the hours arenât available).Permissions Used:    * Fine and Coarse Location - to determine your location    * Internet - used to retrieve map and starbucks data    * read phone state and identity - used by ad networkPlease email for support before leaving a negative review.Starbucks, the Starbucks logo are (c) Starbucks Corporation. Coffee Finder is not affiliated with or endorsed by the Starbucks Corporation.

reviews.title: Just Installed and...
reviews.comment: a list and visual gmap of all Starbucks immediately came up.  However,  what I would love to see is an option to type in the store you wish to search for. Working ok so far. Samsung S4
reviews.author: manic angel

reviews.title: Location doesn\'t work!!!
reviews.comment: Keeps saying I\'m in Africa when I live in California.  Tried everything and can\'t get location to work.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Jason Olson

reviews.title: Caffeine not included
reviews.comment: Nice and quick to find but nutrition info needs caffeine amount. I know it\'s user entered.  I\'ll definitely give it a 5 star if that was added.
reviews.author: David Tran

reviews.title: Search failure and wrong positions in Hong Kong
reviews.comment: - fails in \"current view\" search mode. it keeps going back to street name search. - wrong positions for Starbucks in Hong Kong - when search for all selected, it simply returns a result of \"none\" in Hong Kong, where there are obviously plural Starbucks.
reviews.author: Shuo Feng

reviews.title: Can\'t find Peet\'s!
reviews.comment: It\'s not finding peet\'s coffee in my area, so not useful for me.
reviews.author: Tim Souza

reviews.title: Ok..
reviews.comment: When it works, even when I manually give it my location it just sits there loading for ages
reviews.author: Aimee Garner

reviews.title: On the money! Saved me a trip every time.
reviews.comment: It\'s good app and it\'s free so it\'s perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine on S3
reviews.comment: Works for me. Could you add Costa? I tried to pitch it as a new idea - but that page does NOT work....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Find all this on MapQuest
reviews.comment: All this has its own coffee button show me new stuff! But nice setup.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for cities
reviews.comment: Didn\'t find the locations in small towns on our vacation, but located plenty within a half mile of our hotel in Toronto.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it, kind of
reviews.comment: Most of the time it works well. But it just took me to a large area of trees with the promise I could find a starbucks there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK for Starbucks but missing a lot of Tim Hortons.
reviews.comment: Should also have McDonalds, Coffee Time, and Country Style.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So it definitely works, BUT...
reviews.comment: It only accounts for Starbucks shops in the Philippines, it only accounts for shops nearest me, and even then, there are some shops that don\'t register here, but register in Google Maps. Weird...
reviews.author: Paolo Ariedo

reviews.title: Love the update
reviews.comment: Adding other coffee shop was brilliant
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Found you!
reviews.comment: Restarted my phone and had loved your Find a Starbucks app. Couldn\'t find it on the Play Store to reload it but found this.  The official Starbucks app is not as good as this app for finding their stores.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works for me
reviews.comment: This is an invaluable app. AND it is free.
reviews.author: Dusty White

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Really easy to use, works great on my Dinc. Thanks for adding the California coffee shops!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fining java on the road
reviews.comment: Not always right...but usually faithfully finds me my morning caffeine fix... And I travel all over the US... Nice app.
reviews.author: Allison Stahl

reviews.title: Use Google
reviews.comment: This app may find coffee shops but if you\'re not familiar with the area (the ONLY reason to use it really) you\'ll be driving in circles. It changes where you are dramatically so you never get close enough to a Starbucks to see it. One minute I\'m on the road close, the next it shows that I\'m on the other side of the Starbucks. Best use Google and know how to read road signs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Love it!!! Thank you :-)
reviews.author: A Google User
